trends: There have been 27 other sightings in Providence
There were no other sightings in Providence on or around April 20th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsI was looking out my window as I do every day when I noticed a shiny metalic objectic moving south in a very eratic pattern it was just a little over the clouds, as when it passed the clouds it seemed to go behind them. I only watched it for a couple of minutes be fore it dissapeared behind some clouds. Where I live the air traffic usally follows an east west pattern, this was clearlly going south and it was about 2 degrees from 12:00 high so it was almost over head. It appeared to be small and disk shaped very shinney as when the sun hit it it shined like a star, and it was moving in a ver jaged line but still south.
